name: electron-ui-kit
description: HTML / CSS components with native look for cross-platform Electron apps

scripts.start: ./node_modules/.bin/parallelshell "npm run build:global" "npm run build:elementaryos" "npm run build:macosx" "npm run build:windows10" "npm run build:copyimages"

author: Gustavo Leon <gustavo.leon@outlook.com>
